Shipment.name: Shipment
Shipment.description: Represents a product item that’s in transit between two inventory locations.

ActualDeliveryDate.description: The date when the product was delivered.

DeliveredToId.description: The person or entity the product was delivered to.

DestinationLocationId.description: The place the product is to be delivered.

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: The date when the product is expected to be delivered.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isn’t null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

ReturnOrderId.description: The return order associated with a return shipment.

ShipFromAddress.description: The place the product is coming from.

ShipFromCity.description: The city of the address where the shipment originates.

ShipFromCountry.description: The country of the address where the shipment originates.

ShipFromGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the address where the shipment originates.

ShipFromLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address where the shipment originates. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipFromLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address where the shipment originates. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipFromPostalCode.description: The postal code of the address where the shipment originates.

ShipFromState.description: The state of the address where the shipment originates.

ShipFromStreet.description: The street of the address where the shipment originates.

ShipToAddress.description: The physical address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToCity.description: The city of the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToCountry.description: The country of the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address where the shipment is delivered. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipToLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address where the shipment is delivered. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipToPostalCode.description: The postal code of the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToState.description: The state of the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipToStreet.description: The street of the address where the shipment is delivered.

ShipmentNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the shipment.

SourceLocationId.description: The location where the shipment originates.

Status.description: The status of the shipment. The picklist includes the following values, which can be customized: Shipped—The product is in transit. Delivered—The product is at the source location.

TotalItemsQuantity.description: The total quantity of items included in the shipment. This value is calculated as the sum of the quantities of the shipment items in the shipment.

TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number for the shipment.

TrackingUrl.description: The URL of the website used for tracking the shipment.
